name: Soul Searching (itch) (Heillos, Kilreth)
description:
Ancient tales warn of the Yrtemmys Forest that steals the souls of the innocent. You decided to cross the forest as a shortcut home, and your soul became hopelessly lost. It's now up to you to reunite with your soul again, or it'll become a tortured ghoul, trapped in the forest forever!

Instructions

  • Arrow keys or WASD to move your body
  • Your soul mirrors your body, and will move right instead of left and vice versa
  • Your soul can glide over ponds and through living trees, but not trees cut down in the real world 
  • Avoid the monsters in the dream world
  • Reunite your soul with your body!

Made for Global Game Jam Wellington - 2022

Github page: https://github.com/twillacy/soul-searching

GGJ page: https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/soul-searching-4

Art:

  • Alice Yu Li (alice_yu_li on Instagram)
  • Natasha Bishop (Maki-Tak on DeviantArt and itch.io)

Music:

  • Jonathan Brown (Kilreth on SoundCloud and itch.io)

Programming:

  • Travis Willacy
